DOC.brief_summary: The purpose th study evaluate change life quality patient affect rhinoconjuntivitis without asthma immunotherapy treatment . It observational , prospective comparative study before-after immunotherapy treatment one year follow-up .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating Life Quality Patients With Rhinoconjunctivitis
DOC.criteria: Based Routine Clinical Practice Inclusion criterion : Patients affect allergic rhinoconjunctivitis sensityzed one several aeroallergens.Although allergic rhinoconjunctivitis pathology study , inclusion patient mild concomitant asthma allow ( GINA 2013 ) Patients old 12 year old Patients subsidiary receive allergen immunotherapy treatment Patients obtain prick test result ≥ 3 mm diameter aeroallergen . Positive negative control test give consistent result . Patients specific immunoglobulin E ≥ class 2 ( CAP/PHADIA ) aeroallergen . Exclusion criterion ( base routine clinical practice ) : Patients severe asthma forzed expiratoy volumen 1 second FEV1 < 70 % even pharmacologically control . Patients : immunological , cardiac , renal hepatic illness medical condition investigator seem relevant interfere treatment . Patients previous history anaphylaxis Patients treatment tricyclic antidepressives , phenothiazine , βblockers , Angiotensin Converting Enzyme Inhibitors ( ACEI ) Female patient pregnant breastfeeding
